animated.description: Determines whether the sections stripes should be animated, if set, striped prop is ignored, false by default
animated.description_zh: 确定是否应该对 sections stripes 进行动画处理，如果设置，则忽略 striped prop，默认为 false

color.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS value, theme.primaryColor by default
color.description_zh: theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 值，默认为 theme.primaryColor

striped.description: Determines whether the section should have stripes, false by default
striped.description_zh: 确定该部分是否应具有条带，默认情况下为 false

withAria.description: Determines whether aria-* props should be added to the root element, true by default
withAria.description_zh: 确定是否应将 aria-* props 添加到根元素中，默认为 true

value.description: Value of the section in 0–100 range
